member.name: T:CDBReports.DataTableExtensions
member.summary: This module exists in CDBNReports because extension methods can only work from other libraries when Option Infer is on For some reason it isn't in this library, so we have to store our extensions locally. If anyone else needs this method, please don't copy it but add the file as a linked file (Add Existing Item > Add Button drop down > Add as Link

member.name: M:CDBReports.Report.GenerateDataTableFromOutput
member.summary: Re-generates the DataTable representation of the CSV file. If the CSV file doesn't exist then it clears the DataTable

member.name: P:CDBReports.ReportBase.Data
member.summary: This property must be overridden at inherited-level to return the data that the report generated in a DataTable format. If this is not possible then the property must return a null object. If the DataTable cannot be generated because there is no data, then an empty DataTable must be returned.

member.name: E:CDBReports.ReportBase.Generated
member.summary: This event notifies consuming classes that the report data generation has been completed and the Data property should not contain data.
member.remarks: The event is implemented for the IDataGenerator(Of DataTable) interface and is intended for the support of third party Report extensions.

member.name: M:CDBReports.ReportBase.OnUpdated
member.summary: This method must be called by consuming classes after any data was modified by them, in order for the report to re-persist any data as necessary
member.remarks: The method is implemented for the IDataGenerator(Of DataTable) interface and is intended for the support of third party Report extensions.
